urls.title: The Coronavirus Crisis: Herd Immunity has Infected UK Policy – But Who Was Patient Zero for this Toxic Transatlantic Idea? – Byline Times
urls.description: Peter Jukes finds more evidence that the origin of the disastrous concept can be traced back to the Prime Minister's chief advisor Dominic Cummings and his US links.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
So I've tracked down Dominic Cummings interest in herd immunity back to 2013, in his 237 page-long paper Some Thoughts on Education and Political Priorities, which is fraught with pseudo evolutionary ideas about economics and modelling.

 https://t.co/OOtG1KC9oz
